normalized: the majuu was rampaging, thrashing its front and back legs, and even its tail.
due to the force with which it writhed, its body ended up being soaked by the puddles of water around it.
at that very moment──
it howled so loudly that it even seemed to cause a rumble in the earth, and stood up in a panic.
having stood up, the majuu promptly shook its entire body, spraying moisture around.
splashes of dirty water from the puddles danced around the area.

name: asagi
normalized: …no way.
asagi stared at the puddles.
no, there was no time to hesitate.
all or nothing, asagi began running towards the majuu.
having seen that, the majuu lowered its body timidly.
it was a posture that said it was about to run away.

name: asagi
normalized: fuh!
asagi nimbly leapt toward the majuu, and, turning a full revolution in the air, came down and landed on its head.

name: asagi
normalized: fufu.
pointing a daring smile at the majuu, asagi immediately kicked off the top of its head and took a big leap.
the beast howled like it was in a fit of rage, and kicked off the ground in order to pursue asagi.
having confirmed that the majuu was chasing her, asagi leapt in front of the building's water storage tank.
she lured the bloodthirsty creature, which was approaching her from behind, until the very last moment, and――

name: asagi
normalized: haah!
scythed her sword down towards the water tank.
the tank split in half, and a huge amount of water gushed out from inside.
asagi kicked off from the base of the tank, dancing through the night sky, and landed on the floor.
the majuu she was facing was bathed in a large amount of water, lost balance, and collapsed.

name: asagi
normalized: i wonder if you've gotten a little softer, being soaked with water?
the beast, which had gotten up quickly, prepared to run away.
asagi ran at the speed of light.

name: asagi
normalized: i won't let you escape!
with speed that even similar taimanin couldn't follow, it looked like she had just passed through the beast's back.
the majuu had lost its two hind legs.
asagi sharply turned around.
and raised her katana overhead.
in silence, asagi lopped off the majuu's head.
and then, immediately, the beast's body was enveloped in flame.
the head and hind legs that she had cut off were no exception.
they had burst into flames, and instantly turned to ash.
